p.d: In December 1970, the English band Yes recorded a few of their hits from their second album, Time and a Word, for the show Pop Shop. Jon Anderson, Chris Squire, Steve Howe, and Alan White join the RTB team in studio, then in Bruges, to the North Sea, and finally in a convertible car to sing “Astral Traveller,” “Everydays,” “Then,” and “No Opportunity Necessary, No Experience Needed.”
